TEXT.TITLE: NATIONAL HEALTHCARE <NHC> OPENS CENTER
TEXT.BODY: National HealthCorp LP said it has opened a 120-bed nursing care and phsical therapy center in Pensacola, Fla., called Palm Gardens of Pensacola. It said it manages the center for owner Florida Convalescent Centers Inc. Reuter
